alert.note: Alert for Douglas (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 10 at 12:18PM MDT until July 10 at 1:00PM MDT by NWS Boulder
info.description: The National Weather Service in Denver Colorado has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Douglas County in northeastern Colorado... * Until 100 PM MDT. * At 1218 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Sprucewood, or 27 miles south of Denver, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Roxborough Park around 1235 PM MDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Castle Rock, Sedalia, Louviers, southwestern Centennial, Highlands Ranch, Parker, Lone Tree, Castle Pines and The Pinery. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
